title: Incident - Can't Access Shared Drive
description: A user reports they can no longer access a specific shared folder on the network that they could access yesterday.

tasks.description: Check the user's group memberships in Active Directory.
tasks.expected_outcome: Technician finds the user is a member of the correct security group for that drive.

tasks.description: Check the permissions (ACL) on the shared folder itself.
tasks.expected_outcome: Technician finds that the required security group was accidentally removed from the folder's permissions.

tasks.description: Re-add the correct security group to the folder's permissions.
